chorus.text:
Beautiful robes, (Beautiful robes,) Beautiful robes, (Beautiful robes,) Robes of light,
Gar-ments of light, Love-ly and bright, (Omit,) . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .
Beautiful robes, Beautiful robes, Beautiful robes, Robes of light, Beautiful robes we then shall wear.
